name: Lead Data Quality Analyst
description:
We are looking for a highly capable data quality analyst to develop procedures to enhance the DQ metrics of our organization's data. You will be performing data analysis, collaborating with data engineers, architect, stewards to enhance data collection and storage procedures, and preparing data analysis reports.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Developing a suite of Data Quality scorecards that help increase awareness of data quality and identify high value data initiatives;

  • Identifying the root cause of data quality issues and work with stakeholders: Data Domain Owners, Data Product Owners, Stewards to resolve;

  • To identify a standard process for dealing with data issues from identification to resolution;

  • Supporting the definition of a governance framework;

  • To develop education tools/courses and documentation to support our users;

  • Supporting the Data Management the delivery communication plan to help establish a cultural change in how data is perceived and managed;

  • Working collaboratively with Stewards, Data Domain owners, Data Product Owners and Engineers to establish and drive best Data Quality practice;

  • Performing statistical tests on large datasets to determine data quality and integrity;

  • Be responsible for DQ tool development & implementation;

  • Running data queries to identify issues and data exceptions, as well as cleaning data;

  • Adhering to best practices in data analysis and collection;

  • Keeping abreast of developments and trends in data quality analysis.

Job Specifications/Qualifications:

  • Experience in driving the improvement of data quality in an enterprise data management or data governance team;

  • Knowledge of quality management methodologies and principles;

  • Exceptional analytical skills;

  • Understanding DWH development principles;

  • Advanced problem-solving skills;

  • Knowledge of best practices in data analysis;

  • Good interpersonal and communication skills;

  • Ability to hold teams accountable to rules frameworks or delivery;

  • Good written and spoken English;

We offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Annual bonus
  • Medical insurance
  • 100% sick leave compensation
  • Flexible working hours / Hybrid work
  • Additional paid vacation if you work more than 5 years.
  • Great educational program that you form by yourself.
